Chrysalis then, took a couple steps back and sat down on a few rocks that were behind the trio.

"Luna,", now with a softer tone. "First, you are VERY beautiful. To me, there couldn't be a more beautiful mare than you! Second, whatever Nightmare Moon was, she is no more! I don't see any Nightmare Moon here. I only see a beautiful, sexy, kind, responsible, caring and lonely mare that only wants what's best for her people. Third, and most importantly, I said "I can't", no "I don't want to".

Everypony was shocked at your words. Cadence and Celestia were also touched by them. Celestia never thought that you say such words. For she thought that you were too young and didn't had enough maturity to say or even think them. But, the one that was touched and shocked the most was, of course, Luna.

"Does that mean that...", she said, trailing off.

"Yes, Luna." you nodded. "I want to be with you. Whether as pet, lover or whatever, I want to be with you! When I said I couldn't do it, it was because, while I'm sure my parents and friends would understand if we talked with them, like Celestia said, I'm a minor. I can't go with you, YET."

"Alright. I'll go. And I'll wait anxiously for out meetings and for the day of our reunion. On the midnight of your 18th birthday, I shall go to your home and pick you up, to take you to your, no, to OUR new lives in Canterlot."

The both of you got up and dusted what sand was in your bodies.

"Then, I'll be waiting for you. Farewell, for now, Luna.", you said, hugging her tightly.

"Farewell, for now, my prince.", she said, grabbing you and kissing you with all the passion she could muster. You, of course, returned the kiss with the same deal of passion. You, reluctantly, parted the kiss and Luna went to were the other royals were.

"Don't forget, Luna. In 14 days, at midnight!", you shouted to her.

*It's a date.*

"*sob, sob* T-thank you. You have n-no idea how long it had been since we heard such kind words. How long it has been since someone besides our sister and Twilight truly enjoyed our night."

"Please, your highness. Just Leon will be enough."

"Alright, but in echange, just call me Luna, okay?"

"And just call me Moon."

"*chuckle* That can be arranged, Luna, Moon."

"Now then, Leon, please grant us the honor of being your mates, even if just for this day."

The doctors said that he should have died two days previous to that but, that stubborn old man said "I won't die util I see this years summer sun celebration with my wife and my kids!" It was a tradition to us. No matter where in Equestria we where, we always found a way to see the Sun raise together that day. And right after Princess Celestia landed after raising the Sun, he passed away."

"Leon..."

"Darling..."

Celestia had always felt proud of raising the sun and of putting a show for the enjoyment of her subjects. However, she didn't felt so proud now, knowing that a life had been taken on one of her "shows".

"I- I'm so sorry, Leon. I-"

"Please, your highness. Don't blame yourself. It's not your fault! That's just what happens. It's the natural course of things. Besides, my old man wouldn't like if anypony, especially you, felt bad because of him. Also, he died in peace and in the way he wanted to. Not to mention that he wouldn't forgive me if I made anypony, a mare above else, cry."

"Leon...T- thank you, Leon."

"You're welcome, Princess Celestia."

"Please, just call me Tia."

"As you wish, Tia."

"Now then, Tia, I know we agreed to do this here but..."

"It's okay. Don't worry. Go somewhere private if you want.", she said with a kind and motherly tone.

"Oh, Tia! Thank you so much!"

"No problem. But, I'm warining you, young man.", Celestia's tone was now serious and threatening.

"Y-yes, Princess?"

"My sister hasn't been this happy in a long, long time. And I'm sure the same applies to Nightmare Moon. So, if you make them cry or hurt them in any way..."

"*sigh**chuckle* Don't worry, Princess Celestia. I would never dream or even think of hurting this two, or anypony else for that matter, in anyway.
If I, somehow, did hurt them, I would let you do as you pleased with me.", you said with a tone as serious as it could be.

"*giggle* Oh Celestia! You are incorregible!"
